publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5474 Cathy Peattie: New Museum and Visitor Attraction Dedicated to Robert Burns—That the Parliament welcomes the Heritage Lottery Fund announcement of a Stage One Pass for a grant of £5,827,000 to create a new museum and visitor attraction dedicated to Robert Burns and believes that this is an essential step towards the celebration in 2009 of the 250th anniversary of the birth of our national bard. Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram*, Colin Fox*, Margaret Jamieson*, Bill Butler*, Mr Jim Wallace*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Fiona Hyslop*, Alex Neil*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Tommy Sheridan*, Murray Tosh*, Alex Johnstone*, Helen Eadie*, Eleanor Scott*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Christine May*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*

S2M-5474 Cathy Peattie: New Museum and Visitor Attraction Dedicated to Robert Burns—That the Parliament welcomes the Heritage Lottery Fund announcement of a Stage One Pass for a grant of £5,827,000 to create a new museum and visitor attraction dedicated to Robert Burns and believes that this is an essential step towards the celebration in 2009 of the 250th anniversary of the birth of our national bard. Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram, Colin Fox, Margaret Jamieson, Bill Butler, Mr Jim Wallace, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Fiona Hyslop, Alex Neil, Mr Frank McAveety, Tommy Sheridan, Murray Tosh, Alex Johnstone, Helen Eadie, Eleanor Scott, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Christine May, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Chris Ballance*, Jackie Baillie*, Robin Harper*, John Swinburne*
S2M-5474 New Museum and Visitor Attraction Dedicated to Robert Burns (lodged on 25 January 2007) Cathie Craigie*, Trish Godman*
S2M-5474 New Museum and Visitor Attraction Dedicated to Robert Burns (lodged on 25 January 2007) Christine Grahame*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-5474 New Museum and Visitor Attraction Dedicated to Robert Burns (lodged on 25 January 2007) Rosie Kane*, Frances Curran*
S2M-5474 New Museum and Visitor Attraction Dedicated to Robert Burns (lodged on 25 January 2007) David McLetchie*, Donald Gorrie*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-5474 New Museum and Visitor Attraction Dedicated to Robert Burns (lodged on 25 January 2007) Irene Oldfather*
S2M-5474 New Museum and Visitor Attraction Dedicated to Robert Burns (lodged on 25 January 2007) Tricia Marwick*
S2M-5474 New Museum and Visitor Attraction Dedicated to Robert Burns (lodged on 25 January 2007) Nora Radcliffe*, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-5474 New Museum and Visitor Attraction Dedicated to Robert Burns (lodged on 25 January 2007) Linda Fabiani*

S2M-5474 Cathy Peattie: New Museum and Visitor Attraction Dedicated to Robert Burns—That the Parliament welcomes the Heritage Lottery Fund announcement of a Stage One Pass for a grant of £5,827,000 to create a new museum and visitor attraction dedicated to Robert Burns and believes that this is an essential step towards the celebration in 2009 of the 250th anniversary of the birth of our national bard. Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram, Colin Fox, Margaret Jamieson, Bill Butler, Mr Jim Wallace, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Fiona Hyslop, Alex Neil, Mr Frank McAveety, Tommy Sheridan, Murray Tosh, Alex Johnstone, Helen Eadie, Eleanor Scott, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Christine May, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Chris Ballance, Jackie Baillie, Robin Harper, John Swinburne, Cathie Craigie, Trish Godman, Christine Grahame, Mr Jamie Stone, Rosie Kane, Frances Curran, David McLetchie, Donald Gorrie, Mr Brian Monteith, Irene Oldfather, Tricia Marwick, Nora Radcliffe, Dr Jean Turner, Linda Fabiani
